scenes.description: Continuation of the musical performance featuring high-energy choreography.
Transition to the MC segment. The group introduces themselves to the audience.
Riana begins the individual introductions with an energetic rap-style greeting.
Niko introduces herself as the comedy specialist of the group.
Su introduces herself with her signature high-energy greeting.
Chiharu introduces herself as the DJ and driver of the group.
Vivi introduces herself with her trademark 'Bibi' catchphrase.
The group discusses their 3D debut and reacts to their new avatars.
Chiharu highlights her favorite features of her 3D model.
Su shares her thoughts on her new 3D appearance.
Niko demonstrates her range of motion with a 'tiger' pose.
Riana shows off her 'sexy' dance moves in 3D.
Niko explains the official hashtag for the live stream.

subtitles.original: 受けなびかせ ぐぐぐっ ぴょぱれ
subtitles.english: Catch the breeze, gu-gu-gu pyopare

subtitles.original: Ready lock, go go go go go go go!
subtitles.english: Ready lock, go go go go go go go!

subtitles.original: 心を 吹き動かせ
subtitles.english: Let your heart be moved

subtitles.original: ぐぐぐっ ぴょぱれ Let it pop pop pop pop pop!
subtitles.english: gu-gu-gu pyopare, Let it pop pop pop pop pop!

subtitles.original: 向かい風に身をまとい進むは
subtitles.english: Clad in a headwind, moving forward

subtitles.original: 24K GOLD READY TO GO READY TO GO GO!
subtitles.english: 24K GOLD READY TO GO READY TO GO GO!

subtitles.original: 深い闇照らす輝き
subtitles.english: The radiance that shines through deep darkness

subtitles.original: 解き放て 黄金の戦士 FLOW GLOW!
subtitles.english: Unleash it, the golden warriors, FLOW GLOW!

subtitles.original: FG!
subtitles.english: FG!

subtitles.original: Vroom!
subtitles.english: Vroom!

subtitles.original: FG! FG! FG! Jump! Jump! Jump! Jump!
subtitles.english: FG! FG! FG! Jump! Jump! Jump! Jump!

subtitles.original: FG!
subtitles.english: FG!

subtitles.original: Flow Glow!
subtitles.english: Flow Glow!

subtitles.original: Flow Glow!
subtitles.english: Flow Glow!

subtitles.original: Flow Glow!
subtitles.english: Flow Glow!

subtitles.original: Flow Glow 3Dライブお披露目の
subtitles.english: Everyone watching Flow Glow's

subtitles.original: ご覧の皆さん、What's up!
subtitles.english: 3D live debut, what's up!

subtitles.original: We are Flow Glow!
subtitles.english: We are Flow Glow!

subtitles.original: 先ほどはFGロードスターと
subtitles.english: Just now, we performed a medley

subtitles.original: 24K GOLDをメドレー形式でお届けしました！
subtitles.english: of FG Roadster and 24K GOLD!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: いや、最初からド派手な登場すぎませんか？
subtitles.english: Man, wasn't that a super flashy entrance?

subtitles.original: まあね、どうやったらみんなを
subtitles.english: Well, we thought about how we could

subtitles.original: あっと驚かせられるか考えた結果だよね！
subtitles.english: really surprise everyone!

subtitles.original: そうなんだよね、一番ド派手なもんで行こうって言って
subtitles.english: Exactly, we said let's go with the flashiest way,

subtitles.original: モニターを突き破ってきました！
subtitles.english: so we burst right through the monitor!

subtitles.original: やりすぎ！聞いたことないわ！
subtitles.english: Too much! I've never heard of that!

subtitles.original: そんな破天荒すぎる私たちなんですけど、まずはね
subtitles.english: That's how wild we are, but first,

subtitles.original: 自己紹介の方からさせていただけたらなと思います！
subtitles.english: I'd like to start with the introductions!

subtitles.original: それでは私から！
subtitles.english: Starting with me!

subtitles.original: 私の音に合図！Riana in the house!
subtitles.english: Signal to my beat! Riana in the house!

subtitles.original: Flow Glowのリーダー、五十嵐梨杏です！ブラブラ〜！
subtitles.english: The leader of Flow Glow, Isaki Riana here! Bra-bra!

subtitles.original: 次はニコ！
subtitles.english: Next is Niko!

subtitles.original: ニコたんが来たー！
subtitles.english: Niko-tan has arrived!

subtitles.original: ホロライブデバイス、Flow Glowのお笑い担当
subtitles.english: Hololive DEV_IS, Flow Glow's comedy specialist,

subtitles.original: 虎金ニコです！ニコたんだよ〜！
subtitles.english: Kogane Niko! It's Niko-tan!

subtitles.original: すーちゃん！
subtitles.english: Su-chan!

subtitles.original: しゅぴしゅわ〜！すーの充電、足りてる？
subtitles.english: Shupishuwa! Is Su's battery charged?

subtitles.original: ホロライブデバイス、Flow Glowのエライ宣伝担当
subtitles.english: Hololive DEV_IS, Flow Glow's Great Promotion Specialist,

subtitles.original: 水宮すうです！
subtitles.english: Mizumiya Su here!

subtitles.original: 次はちは！
subtitles.english: Next is Chiha!

subtitles.original: ハイ！エンジン全開 Let's Go!
subtitles.english: Hi! Engine full throttle, Let's Go!

subtitles.original: Flow GlowのDJ兼運転手担当、輪堂千速です！
subtitles.english: Flow Glow's DJ and driver, Rindo Chiharu here!

subtitles.original: 今日も盛り上がっていこうね！
subtitles.english: Let's have a blast today!

subtitles.original: 次はビビ！
subtitles.english: Next is Vivi!

subtitles.original: はーい！いきますよ、せーの！ビビ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Here we go, one, two... Vivi!

subtitles.original: いつもキラキラな、綺々羅々ヴィヴィです！
subtitles.english: Always sparkling, Kikirara Vivi here!

subtitles.original: みんな今日も盛り上がっていきましょう！よろしく！
subtitles.english: Everyone, let's get hyped today! Nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: 今日は私たち5人で最高のライブをお届けしていくぞ！
subtitles.english: Today, the five of us will deliver the best live show ever!

subtitles.original: さて、すでにお気づきかとは思いますが、ついに
subtitles.english: Now, you've probably noticed by now, but finally...

subtitles.original: Flow Glowも3Dデビューしました！
subtitles.english: Flow Glow has made its 3D debut!

subtitles.original: そりゃ気づくよね！こんだけ動いてたらね！
subtitles.english: Of course they noticed! We're moving around so much!

subtitles.original: ちなみにビビ、3Dになった自分の体を見てどう思いますか？
subtitles.english: By the way Vivi, how do you feel seeing your 3D body?

subtitles.original: いや、こんなにキューティー・セクシー・ヘルシーでね
subtitles.english: Man, it's so cutie, sexy, and healthy...

subtitles.original: みんなもっとビビのこと好きになっちゃったな、ほんまや〜！
subtitles.english: everyone's gonna fall for Vivi even more, for real!

subtitles.original: ハイ、ありがとね！千速はどう？
subtitles.english: Okay, thank you! Chiharu, how about you?

subtitles.original: はい！千速はもちろん、この太もも！見てください！
subtitles.english: Yes! For me, of course, it's these thighs! Look at them!

subtitles.original: もっと見て！もっと見て！
subtitles.english: Look more! Look more!

subtitles.original: 絶対領域決まってるからね！ハイタイプだからね！
subtitles.english: My absolute territory is perfect! Since I'm the tall type!

subtitles.original: すーちゃんはどうですか？
subtitles.english: What about you, Su-chan?

subtitles.original: はい、すーはまぁ、カッコいいかな？みたいな
subtitles.english: Yeah, I think I look... cool? Or something.

subtitles.original: イケてるかな？みたいなね！
subtitles.english: Like, I look pretty fly!

subtitles.original: いや、水宮ってカッコいい！
subtitles.english: Wow, Mizumiya is so cool!

subtitles.original: いや、そんなキャラじゃなかったよ！お嬢ちゃんね！
subtitles.english: Wait, that wasn't your character! You're a young lady!

subtitles.original: バレちゃったな！カッコいい！
subtitles.english: You caught me! I'm cool!

subtitles.original: ニコたん！
subtitles.english: Niko-tan!

subtitles.original: ニコたん完全に虎！ほら！
subtitles.english: Niko-tan is completely a tiger! Look!

subtitles.original: さっきまで二足歩行じゃなかった？
subtitles.english: Weren't you walking on two legs just now?

subtitles.original: いや、ライブで踊るんだから四足にはできないでしょ！
subtitles.english: Well, I'm dancing in a live show, so I can't be on all fours!

subtitles.original: 梨杏はどうですか？
subtitles.english: How about you, Riana?

subtitles.original: そうですね、まあ、私も、やっぱりセクシー！
subtitles.english: Let's see, well, I'm also... sexy as expected!

subtitles.original: セクシーや！すごい似合ってるよね！
subtitles.english: You're sexy! It really suits you!

subtitles.original: このセクシーダンスをね、お披露目できるかなと思うとすごく嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy to be able to show off this sexy dance!

subtitles.original: 素晴らしい！可愛くて楽しみですね！
subtitles.english: Wonderful! You're cute and I'm looking forward to it!

subtitles.original: そんな5人でお届けするライブの、ハッシュタグについてニコよろしく！
subtitles.english: Niko, please explain the hashtag for today's live with the five of us!

subtitles.original: はーい！今日の3Dライブのハッシュタグ、右上をご覧ください！
subtitles.english: Okay! Check the top right for today's 3D live hashtag!

subtitles.original: ハッシュタグ #FG3Dライブ です！
subtitles.english: It's hashtag #FG3DLive!

subtitles.original: 切り抜きやスクショに加えて、Xでたくさんポストしてください！
subtitles.english: Please post lots on X with clips and screenshots!

subtitles.original: お願いします！トレンド1位目指すぞ！
subtitles.english: Please! Let's aim for #1 on trending!

subtitles.original: あとライブを見てくれてるみんな！コメントで声援を送ってください！
subtitles.english: Also, everyone watching! Please send us your cheers in the comments!

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします！待ってます！
subtitles.english: Thank you! We're waiting for them!
